name: Oblique Strategies for Playdate
description:
The Oblique Strategies constitute a set of over 100 cards, each of which is a suggestion of a course of action or thinking to assist in creative situations.

Created in 1975 by musician/artist Brian Eno and multimedia artist Peter Schmidt.

· smooth infinite crank scrolling · dark mode · five fonts tuned for the Playdate screen v1.01 - added font options v1.02 - added smooth scrolling when buttons are pressed v1.03 - improved crank sfx
